alert.note: Alert for Houston (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 1:14AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Allamakee, southeastern Houston, western Vernon and northwestern Crawford Counties through 200 AM CDT... At 113 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Caledonia to 7 miles southeast of Spring Grove. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Brownsville around 125 AM CDT. Stoddard around 130 AM CDT. New Albin around 135 AM CDT. Lansing around 145 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Brinkman Ridge, Esofea, Red Mound, Spring Ridge, Rush Creek, Quandahl, County 5 And Peyton Road, Runge Hollow, Red Barn Campground and County Roads B And Y. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
